channel.title: Age Of Empires II on Alan Cortez
channel.description: Recent content in Age Of Empires II on Alan Cortez

item.title: Age Of Empires Clan Webpage.
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository and the website. This is a simple webpage made with Bootstrap that shows some stats from an Age Of Empires II Clan I have with some friends.

item.title: Age of Empires II - Current Match (Python Script).
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository. This code fetches information about the most recent (or ongoing) Age of Empires II match played by a specific profile and gives details such as ELO rating, civ and bonuses.

item.title: Age of Empires II - AI Scripting.
item.description: This is a brief introduction to AI scripting in Age Of Empires II.

item.title: Age of Empires II - Most used civilizations (Python Script).
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository. A Python script that uses LibreMatch API to output a Plotly pie chart of the civs used.

item.title: Age of Empires II - Most Recent Match (Python Script).
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository. A Python script that uses LibreMatch API to output information about a player’s most recent match in Age Of Empires II DE.

item.title: Age Of Carpincho Website.
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository and the website. A site made with Angular framework that shows Plotly graphs of Age Of Empires II data.

item.title: Age of Empires II - Most used civilizations (R Script).
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository. R script to get the last 10 matches (using aoe2.

item.title: Age of Empires II - Compare players' ratings (R Script).
item.description: Check out the GitHub repository. R script that outputs a Plotly graph comparing player’s elo rating across time, using aoe2.
